content: Configure Password Strength Settings to enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords.

comment.text: Configure Password Strength Settings to enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords. This message is used in a security settings category, where users can enable password strength settings and learn how it applies.

usage.context:
{t("SettingPasswordTittle")}
 </Text>
 
 <div className="category-item-description">
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 {t("SettingPasswordDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="SaveToApply" />
 </Text>
 {passwordStrengthSettingsUrl ? (

return (
 <MainContainer>
 <LearnMoreWrapper withoutExternalLink={!passwordStrengthSettingsUrl}>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400">
 {t("SettingPasswordDescription")}
 </Text>
 <Text fontSize="13px" fontWeight="400" className="learn-subtitle">
 <Trans t={t} i18nKey="SaveToApply" />
 </Text>
 {passwordStrengthSettingsUrl ? (

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تهيئة إعدادات قوة كلمة المرور لتعزيز حماية كلمة المرور' doesn't fully capture the original meaning of 'Configure Password Strength Settings to enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords.' Specifically, the phrase 'computation-resistant' is missing. While 'حماية كلمة المرور' (password protection) is correct, it doesn't convey the 'computation-resistant' aspect, which implies difficulty in guessing or cracking the password.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: تهيئة إعدادات قوة كلمة المرور لتعزيز حماية كلمة المرور المقاومة للاختراق أو التخمين.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Daha təhlükəsiz, hesablamaya davamlı şifrələri tətbiq etmək üçün Şifrə Gücü Parametrlərini konfiqurasiya edin' is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and flow in Azerbaijani.  'tətbiq etmək üçün' (to apply) is somewhat awkward in this context. The word 'davamlı' (resistant) might also be better phrased depending on the desired nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrasing like: 'Daha təhlükəli hesablamalara qarşı dayanan, daha güclü şifrələr yaratmaq üçün Şifrə Gücü Parametrlərini konfiqurasiya edin.'  or 'Daha təhlükəli, hesablamaya çətin şifrələr istifadə etmək üçün Şifrə Gücü Parametrlərini konfiqurasiya edin.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a capitalized "Настройките" which may not be ideal. It could be less formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: настройките

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'odolných vůči výpočtům' (resistant to computations) is not the best translation of 'computation-resistant'. While technically correct, it's overly literal and sounds awkward in Czech.  A more natural and idiomatic translation would emphasize the difficulty in cracking the password.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurace nastavení síly hesla pro vynucení bezpečnějších hesel, která je obtížné prolomit.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'která je obtížné prolomit' adds slightly more length and could be stylistically improved. Consider a shorter, more elegant alternative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurace nastavení síly hesla pro vynucení bezpečnějších hesel, které je náročné prolomit.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "zu stellen" is not the correct way to express 'enforce' in this context. It implies setting or establishing something, not forcing or requiring adherence to a standard.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurieren Sie die Einstellungen für die Passwortstärke, um stärkere, rechenfeste Passwörter durchzusetzen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'rechenfeste' is a literal translation of 'computation-resistant' which isn't the most natural way to express it in German. While technically accurate, it sounds overly technical for a user-facing setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurieren Sie die Einstellungen für die Passwortstärke, um stärkere, schwer zu knackende Passwörter durchzusetzen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ανθεκτικούς στους υπολογισμούς" is a literal translation of "computation-resistant" and sounds unnatural in Greek. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of passwords that are difficult to crack by computation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διαμορφώστε τις Ρυθμίσεις ισχύος κωδικού πρόσβασης για να επιβάλλετε πιο ασφαλείς κωδικούς πρόσβασης, δυσνόητους σε υπολογιστές.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the long phrase "κωδικούς πρόσβασης, δυσνόητους σε υπολογιστές" could be slightly improved for readability. Consider breaking it up.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Διαμορφώστε τις Ρυθμίσεις ισχύος κωδικού πρόσβασης για να επιβάλλετε πιο ασφαλείς κωδικούς πρόσβασης, που είναι δυσνόητοι σε υπολογιστές.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'computation-resistant' is not naturally translated in Finnish. The current translation, while literal, doesn't convey the intended meaning effectively. 'Laskennan kestäviä' feels awkward and overly technical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'vaikeampia arvata' (harder to guess), 'vahvempia salasanoja' (stronger passwords), or 'kestävämpiä hyökkäyksiltä' (more resistant to attacks). The best choice depends on the overall context and desired tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'computation-resistant' is not accurately reflected in the translation 'plus résistants au piratage'. While 'piratage' relates to hacking, 'computation-resistant' implies difficulty in brute-force guessing or cracking, which is not conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurez les paramètres de force du mot de passe pour imposer des mots de passe plus sûrs et plus difficiles à déchiffrer.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "computation-resistant" doesn't have a direct equivalent in Italian that accurately conveys the intended meaning. 'Computation-resistant' implies passwords that are difficult for computers to crack through brute force or other automated methods. The current translation, 'resistenti,' is too generic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configura le impostazioni di complessità della password per applicare password più sicure e difficili da indovinare/craccare.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'computation-resistant' is awkwardly translated. '計算抵抗のある' (keisan teikou no aru) doesn't accurately convey the intended meaning of resisting brute-force attacks. It literally translates to 'computationally resistant,' which isn't the right nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: パスワード強度の設定により、より安全で、推測されにくいパスワードを強制します。(Pasuwa-do tsuyosa no settei ni yori, yori anzen de, suiso sare ni kurushii pasuwa-do o kyusei shimasu.) - This translates to 'Configure password strength settings to enforce more secure and hard-to-guess passwords.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'computation-resistant' is not accurately conveyed. '도출하기 어려운' (dochalhagi eoryeoun) translates to 'difficult to derive' or 'hard to figure out,' which isn't precisely the same as 'computation-resistant'.  'Computation-resistant' implies protection against automated cracking attempts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 더욱 안전하고 해킹에 강한 비밀번호를 적용하려면 비밀번호 강도 설정을 구성하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not accurately conveyed by "ທົນທານຕໍ່ການຄິດໄລ່". It implies resistance to calculations, not necessarily strength against brute force attacks. A more appropriate translation might focus on 'difficult to guess' or 'complex'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕັ້ງຄ່າການຕັ້ງຄ່າຄວາມເຂັ້ມຂອງລະຫັດຜ່ານເພື່ອບັງຄັບໃຊ້ລະຫັດຜ່ານທີ່ປອດໄພກວ່າ, ຫາຍາກທີ່ຈະຄາດຄະເນໄດ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the long phrase could benefit from better readability. Consider breaking it into two sentences for clarity in Lao.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຕັ້ງຄ່າການຕັ້ງຄ່າຄວາມເຂັ້ມຂອງລະຫັດຜ່ານເພື່ອບັງຄັບໃຊ້ລະຫັດຜ່ານທີ່ປອດໄພກວ່າ. ລະຫັດຜ່ານຄວນຈະຫາຍາກທີ່ຈະຄາດຄະເນໄດ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "skaitļošanas izturīgas" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "computation-resistant." It literally translates to 'computation-resistant' but doesn't convey the intended meaning of passwords being difficult to crack through computation. A more suitable phrasing would be something along the lines of 'grūti uzlaužamas ar datoriem' or 'pret dažādiem uzlaušanas paņēmieniem'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurējiet paroles stipruma iestatījumus, lai ieviestu drošākas paroles, kas grūti uzlaužamas ar datoriem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "odporne na złamanie hasła" is a literal translation of 'resistant to breaking' and doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'computation-resistant'. It's a bit awkward in Polish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing such as "trudne do złamania" (difficult to crack) or "wytrzymałe na ataki" (resistant to attacks) or "bardzo silne i trudne do odgadnięcia" (very strong and difficult to guess).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'resistentes à computação' (resistant to computation) is not the best translation of 'computation-resistant'. It's a literal translation that doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of strong passwords that are difficult for computers to crack. A better translation would focus on the difficulty of cracking the password.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Defina as configurações de força da senha para impor senhas mais seguras e difíceis de serem quebradas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "resistentes à computação" is an awkward and inaccurate translation of "computation-resistant." It doesn't convey the intended meaning of resisting attacks from computers/automated tools.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Defina as configurações de força da senha para impor senhas mais seguras e difíceis de serem quebradas por computadores.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'crea parole puternice și le securiza' doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords'. 'Computation-resistant' is a key aspect of the English phrase that's missing. 'Crea' implies creation, while the English describes a configuration or setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configurați setări pentru nivelul de complexitate al parolelor, astfel încât acestea să fie puternice și rezistente la atacuri.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase 'parole puternice și le securiza' is slightly awkward. 'Le securiza' could be improved for a smoother read.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: parole puternice și mai sigure

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not accurately translated. While "පරිගණන-ප්‍රතිරෝධී" (parigana-pratirodhi) literally translates to 'computation-resistant', it's not a common or natural expression in Sinhala in this context. A more understandable translation would convey the idea of passwords that are difficult to guess or crack.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a phrase like 'හසුරුවනවාට වඩා දුෂ්කර මුරපද' (hasurunavata vadata dushkara murapad), which translates to 'passwords that are more difficult to guess' or 'passwords that are hard to crack'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "වින්‍යාස කරන්න" (vinaysa karanna) can be slightly formal and less conversational. Depending on the target audience, a simpler phrasing might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "වින්‍යාස කරන්න" with something like "මාලාවක් කරන්න" (malawakk karanna) or just "සකසන්න" (sakasanne).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "nastavte silu hesla, aby používatelia boli nútení zadávať bezpečnejšie hesla odolne voči útokom" does not accurately convey the meaning of 'Configure Password Strength Settings to enforce more secure, computation-resistant passwords'. The phrase 'odolne voči útokom' (resistant to attacks) is not the most precise equivalent of 'computation-resistant'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte nastavenia pre silu hesla, aby vynútili bezpečné a ťažko uhádnutelné heslo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'boli nútení zadávať' is a bit clunky.  A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: vynútili zadávanie

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'odpornih na vdore' (resistant to intrusions) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'computation-resistant'. It implies protection against hacking rather than difficulty to calculate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurirajte nastavitve moči gesla za uveljavljanje varnejših gesel, ki so težko izračunljiva.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "отпорније лозинке на рачунарске нападе" is a literal translation of "computation-resistant passwords" but is awkward and less natural in Serbian. It implies resistance specifically to computer attacks, whereas the original meaning is about computational difficulty.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Конфигуришите Подешавања Јачине лозинке како бисте применили сигурније, сложеније лозинке.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation uses a comma after 'сигурније' which is grammatically correct but might not align with the English phrasing. Consistency across settings labels should be checked.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the comma after 'сигурније' for consistency with other settings labels, if applicable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "otpornije lozinke na računarske napade" is not the best translation of "computation-resistant passwords." It translates more to 'resistant passwords to computer attacks' which isn't the intended meaning. It implies the passwords resist attacks, rather than being difficult to compute.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurišite Podešavanja Jačine lozinke kako biste primenili sigurnije lozinke koje su teže za izračunavanje.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a passive voice ("kako biste primenili") which can sound less direct than the English original. While grammatically correct, it is worth considering a more active phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Konfigurišite Podešavanja Jačine lozinke da biste primenili sigurnije lozinke koje su teže za izračunavanje.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'computation-resistant' is not accurately translated. 'Dayanıklı' implies durability, which doesn't fully convey the meaning of resisting computation or brute force attacks.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha güvenli ve kaba kuvvet saldırılarına karşı dayanıklı şifreleri zorunlu kılmak için Şifre Gücü Ayarlarını yapılandırın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence could be slightly more natural-sounding in Turkish. The current wording is a bit formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha güvenli ve kaba kuvvet saldırılarına karşı dayanıklı şifreler sağlamak için Şifre Gücü Ayarlarını yapılandırın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "стійкі до обчислення" (resistant to computation) is an awkward and technically inaccurate translation of 'computation-resistant'. It doesn't convey the intended meaning of passwords being difficult to crack through computation. It sounds unnatural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Налаштуйте параметри надійності пароля, щоб застосовувати більш безпечні паролі, складні для злому.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not accurately conveyed by "chống lại việc phỏng đoán mật khẩu." The original refers to passwords that are difficult to crack through computational methods (e.g., brute-force attacks). "Chống lại việc phỏng đoán mật khẩu" implies resistance to guessing, not computational attacks.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Định cấu hình Thiết lập Độ mạnh của Mật khẩu để tạo mật khẩu an toàn hơn, khó bị bẻ khóa bằng phương pháp tính toán.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a bit wordy and lacks the conciseness of the English original. While grammatically correct, it could be more elegant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Định cấu hình Thiết lập Độ mạnh của Mật khẩu để tăng cường độ an toàn, chống lại các phương pháp tấn công bằng máy tính.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "computation-resistant" is not accurately conveyed by "强密码". "强密码" simply means 'strong password'. The original implies passwords difficult to calculate/brute-force.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 配置密码强度设置，强制使用更安全的，难以破解的密码。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit clunky. It could be improved for better flow in Chinese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 配置密码强度设置，以强制使用更安全且难以破解的密码。
